import React from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router'; import { logout } from '../../../actions'; const NavUserDesktop = ({ refAvatar, user, showBurger, setShowBurger, showSearch, setShowSearch, refMenuList, refSearchBtn, reftHamburgerBtn }) => { const avatar = 'https://bizraise.pro/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/no-avatar-300x300.png' const history = useHistory() const dispatch = useDispatch() //logout const logOut = () => { dispatch(logout()); localStorage.removeItem('user'); localStorage.removeItem('token'); history.push("/login"); } const navMobile = (link) => { history.push(link) setShowBurger(false) } return ( <>
  • {/**/}
{/*Dropdown mobile*/}
setShowBurger(!showBurger)}>
) } export default NavUserDesktop;
